extendedInfo.description: This is a naturally occurring scene as seen from space when the sun is blocked by a planet or moon. It is an amazing breath taking view and we created a 3D Live Wallpaper with the Ring of Fire of the sun. We added lighting effects to enhance the visual affinity on your android phone.Customization features include:Options for transparent box2 different light sourceOption to move lightOption to change viewing angle and change background color.Option for Auto rotation with speed control, or manual control with finger swipe.
